name: Plexonoid
overview: An Arkanoid style game published originally created by Arjan Bjorn Mensch aka Ramy with 33 levels and published in Game On 1992/12 and later in Game On GE 1993/1. Two billion years ago, a vicious oppressor named Gohd trapped your friends in his fortress on the planet Gohdinia. You were chosen to find Gohdinia and to destroy the evil empire of Gohd and free your friends.
